name: Zeke Naulty
title: .NET Developer
summary: Passionate full stack developer with over two decades of experience in crafting innovative software solutions. A problem solver at heart, I thrive on challenges that require creative thinking and critical analysis. Experienced in a wide range of technologies, from frontend frameworks like Angular and React to backend systems using ASP.NET Core and SQL databases. My journey has been marked by continuous learning, embracing new languages and tools to stay at the forefront of technology. I'm driven by my enthusiasm for collaborating with talented teams to build impactful applications that make a difference.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
responsibilities: Develop and maintain .Net WinForms and web applications.
Built backend services to support insurance auto-protect feature using: .net core, hangfire, postgres, sql server, entity framework and other technologies.
Established and taught patterns for unit testing in WinForms.
Contributed ideas and design concepts to several initiatives implemented in the company's growing adoption of domain driven design.

experience.title: Lead Developer
responsibilities: Empowered users with dynamic user defined data models and custom reporting features.
Worked with Asp.Net WebForms, Asp.Net MVC, Asp.Net WebAPI, RESTful OData, SOAP API(s) powered by Oracle, nHibernate, Entity Framework, PL/SQL packages.
Developed responsive web interfaces using CSS3, Flex Box, Bootstrap 3, Bootstrap 4, and MvvM AngularJS.
Developed MS.Net Windows Forms app and Xamarin Forms iOS app for offline and remote work.

experience.title: Programmer Analyst

Modernized 8+ existing modules into a single .net application with role-based security.

Built new reporting frontend and managed project lifecycle using Agile methodologies.

experience.title: Sr. Software Developer
responsibilities: Mentored, managed teams, and handled projects in Windows and Web Development.
Recruited and interviewed in relation to the Microsoft stack.
